entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Becoming sunny late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
